alert.note: Alert for Lancaster (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 3:08PM EDT until July 25 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Lancaster County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 308 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lancaster, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Ephrata, Lititz, Millersville, Willow Street, New Holland, East Petersburg, Akron, Leola, Paradise, Salunga-Landisville and Rothsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
